plot: Trustin needed a totally awesome idea for a screenplay, or he'd have to do the unthinkable, and get a real job. Does he have what it takes to make it?
title: Trustin and the Ideas Machine
plot_es: Trustin needed a totally awesome idea for a screenplay, or he'd have to do the unthinkable, and get a real job. Does he have what it takes to make it?
plot_en: Trustin needed a totally awesome idea for a screenplay, or he'd have to do the unthinkable, and get a real job. Does he have what it takes to make it?

cast.role: The Girl in the Red Dress
cast.name: Rachel Kim Cross
